Html:
When I click on  the file manager for a post, run into thie error:

"The current type, Oxite.Modules.Blogs.Services.IFileService, is an interface and cannot be constructed. Are you missing a type mapping?"

We've recently broken all of Oxite up into modules.  We haven't fully tested all of it yet so that's probably just a refactor bug.  Thanks for the heads up!  We'll get it fixed before the next release.
